name: Waves
0:
”Alexa, open Ocean Sounds”
”Alexa, play Ocean Sounds”
”Alexa, ask Ocean Sounds to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ocean sounds
des:
The Ocean Sounds sleep aid is brought to you by one of the world’s top sleep and relaxation artists. This ultra premium ocean sounds are taken directly from the album “Ocean Sounds” which is used by thousands to aid in sleep and relaxation each night. Now, for the first time, the relaxation power of Ocean Sounds is available on your Alexa device. Ocean Sounds is specifically engineered to help you get to and stay asleep by using a custom equalized recording of real Ocean Sounds.
 
HOW TO USE: To use Ocean Sounds: Say “Alexa, Play Ocean Sounds” Once running, Ocean Sounds will automatically loop all night, or until you say 'Alexa, stop'. 

UNINTERUPTED PLAY: Ocean Sounds premium service includes all night play (5hr instead of 1hr loops) and high quality sound.

To add this Ocean Sounds to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1 - Open your Alexa App.
2 - Select Routines.
3 - Select Schedule, add a time (say 10 PM).
4 - Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5 - Choose ‘Ocean Sounds’, Done.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
